TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. Now you have to grant wishes with just your rusty old crown.

I wish to exist.

Granted! you now exist as data in a flash drive that's been thrown into a thrash-can long time ago. ;-)

I wish I could indefinitely print real proper usable money.

Granted. You are solely responsible for hyperinflation, minimum wage can't keep up, the market crashes and we fall back into a hunter-gatherer bartering society. Thanks.

I wish wealth was more evenly distributed.

Granted. However, all the wealth is spent on hats.

I wish this moment could last forever!

Granted. Like the cloud, all of the magic is sold to people from other people. They get it from Melkor and Sauron, the winning combination.

I wish for a terrain generator with a scaling feature and 3D terrain printer.

Granted. You die after the machines overheat and explodes due to limited size...

I wish for a rocket to space.

Granted. The rocket falls from the sky, crashes into you, and injects explosive quantities of hydrogen into you. You asked it to space you, right?

I wish for the ability to space people.

Granted but now the space people have superpowers and seek their revenge.

I wish for a powered armor suit like iron man or master chief

granted, but it's so powerful that it rips you to pieces before you get in it

i wish for the magic boulder

Granted, but it falls from the sky and lands on top of you.

I wish I could grow a manly beard.

Granted, but it's too manly for you so it runs away and starts a new life in Seattle.

Granted, but it's so Manley that you're kept up by it's constant awesomeness.

Granted, your garden is now full of manly beards.

I still wish for 0.24.

Granted, but it's a fake version that fills your computer with a virus that starts the robotic singularity.

I wish I had earthbending powers

Granted, but since you haven't mastered your new ability yet, you accidentally crushed one of your relatives and your dog (if you don't have one you can wish for it, so you can crush it with earth-bending later)

I wish I could play video games (including KSP) in my mind.

Granted, but it falls from the sky and lands on top of you.

The magic boulder can't fall. I have my doubts whether it's actually in orbit.

Granted. You slowly die from sleep deprivation due to title music always running in your head.

I wish for Algodoo to be more algodoo.

Granted, but the physics kill you.

I wish for more Haruhi Suzumiya references.

Granted, but absolutely no one else gets those references.

I wish my friends could play with me more...

Granted, but you don't like the game...

I wish the next poster could smack himself with water.

Granted, but I only fling about a single droplet lightly against my hand.

I wish the next person would be forced to burn their hands.

Granted. I was forced to burn my hands because of your wish, so I immediately tried to put them out using your robe. It didn't work, and you got burned alive as well.

I wish I had some salami right now.

Granted. Your arms are turned entirely into salami. Checkmate.

I wish I had a sword.

Granted. On first draw from the scabbard you accidentally disembowel yourself and die slowly while gripping your precious sword in your weakening grasp.

I wish for more time.

Granted. You are sentenced to three years in prision.

I wish for space.

Your room fills with vacuum and you die. (This kind of space, right? )

I wish I had a pet goldcrest that will not attack me and could fly spaceplanes without crashing.

Goldcrest:

Granted, but it flew away into deep space in a spaceplane (which you received along with it) and now it's lost forever! (you didn't say the bird has to know orbital mechanics...)

I wish I had a pet penguin that meeps.
